name: 24x36 Inch Cork Bulletin Board for Wall with Natural Wood Frame | Large Pin Board for Office & Home | Includes 20 Push Pins & Mounting Hardware
short_description: Reclaim Your Wall Space & Organize with Ease - Create your personal command center. This spacious 24x36 inch cork board gives you the freedom to display family photos, pin important reminders, and organize your week's schedule—all in one place. Replace sticky notes and paper clutter with a centralized system.

Not Just a Board, It's a Stylish Statement - Crafted for elegance and built to last. Unlike flimsy alternatives, our board features a solid wood frame that resists warping and a high-density cork surface that won't crumble. Its clean, minimalist design adds a touch of sophistication to any room.

Everything Included for Instant Organization—No Guesswork - Start organizing in minutes, not hours. We've done the thinking for you. Inside the box, you'll find not only the board but also 20 colorful push pins and the right wall hardware for a secure, frustration-free installation on drywall.

The Versatile Centerpiece for Every Space & Purpose - Where will you organize your world? * The Home Office: Map out projects and track deadlines. * The Family Kitchen: Keep grocery lists and meal plans in sight. * The Classroom: Celebrate student achievements. * The Entryway: Hang keys and leave messages for loved ones.

Proudly Presented by Starhali—Your Partner in Organization - We believe in products that simplify your life. This cork board is part of our commitment to delivering thoughtful, well-made organization solutions for your home and workspace.

name: Large Cork Board for Wall, Black Felt Bulletin Board with Pushpins, 36" x 24" 6 Panels Wall Tiles, Tack Push Pin Boards for Office
short_description: FELT BULLETIN BOARD: Our ready-to-use kit includes 6 pieces of 12"x12"/30x30 cm, 0.35" thick high-density felt pin board, and 35 piece Push pins. You can combine them into a large board measuring 36×24 inches, or arrange them into any shape you like. (For optimal load-bearing and stability, thumbtacks should be inserted at a 45-degree downward angle.)

DURABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIAL: Crafted from premium polyester fiber, our bulletin boards are designed for long-lasting use. They are tear-resistant, lightweight, and safe for all environments. These boards are odor-free, hypoallergenic, and made from eco-friendly, recyclable materials, ensuring a sustainable choice for your space.

NOISE REDUCTION & WALL PROTECTION: The large felt panels effectively absorb sound, reducing echoes and noise in any room. This makes them ideal for home offices, classrooms, nurseries, recording studios, and commercial settings. Additionally, the felt material protects your walls from scratches and wear.

MULTI-PURPOSE USE: Perfect for displaying photos, notes, schedules, and reminders, these bulletin boards can also serve as decorative elements or wall protectors. Suitable for various settings like offices, homes, kitchens, jewelry storage, tool storage, and more. You can even mix and match different colors to create a visually appealing and functional display.

EASY INSTALLATION & DAMAGE-FREE REMOVAL: Installation is nail-free. Includes 24 pieces of removable, residue-free double-sided adhesive pads. Installation is straightforward and guided by the included manual. When it's time to remove, simply pull the adhesive pads straight down along the wall to avoid any damage.

name: VEVOR Cork Board for Office, 36'' x 24'' Bulletin Board for Wall, Push Pin Board with Framed for Office Home and School
short_description: Large Cork Board: Get ample posting space with VEVOR's 36''x24'' bulletin board. It provides ample space to showcase your ideas, artwork, schedules, and more! Ideal for home or office.

High-Density Cork: Features a high-density cork surface that makes pinning notes effortless and ensures there are no unsightly pinholes even after long-term use. And the cork board's five layers of corrugated core board provide extra durability and make it resistant to piercing.

Durable & Sleek Frame: This pin board boasts a sleek and durable frame made of classic black MDF with a smooth grinding finish. Scratch-proof and stunning, it is perfect for any setting, whether at home or in the office.
Flexible Installation: Our cork boards for walls can be hanging horizontally or vertically, perfect for any space. And thanks to its hanging design, you can easily switch between the two sides.
